cmput301w14t13.project.models.content
Class CommentTreeElement

java.lang.Object
  cmput301w14t13.project.models.content.CommentTreeElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comment, Root, Topic
public abstract class CommentTreeElement
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract class for Topic, Comment, and Root. It is used when Creating or manipulating any of its subclasses, or displayed by HomeView or TopicView

Author:
nsd

getNumberOfChildren

public int getNumberOfChildren()
Goes through all CommentTreeElements children and recursively checks the number of children each chid has, then sums them all up.

Returns:
the total amount of children this CommentTreeElement has

public void addChild(CommentTreeElement post)
Adds a child CommentTreeElement to this CommentTreeElement's childPost list The CommentTreeElement added is a reply to this CommentTreeElement Used by CreateSubmissionController when adding a reply to a Comment Used by CommentTree in Method addElementToCurrent when adding a reply to a Topic

Parameters:

getDateDiff

public java.lang.String getDateDiff(java.util.Date previous,
                                    java.util.Date current)
Returns the difference between two times in a readable manner using the most relevant format E.g. seconds, minutes, hours, days Used inside TopicView and HomeView to show the user how old a Topic or Comment is.

Parameters:
previous. - the date the Topic or Comment was Created
current - date the date when method is called
Returns:
